message:
Thank you for partnering with Ex Stay. Please find attached the {{ doc.name }} for your reference.

Kindly review the details and let us know if any modifications are needed. If everything is in order, please proceed with the necessary steps to confirm the reservation.

If you have any questions or require further assistance, feel free to reach out. We look forward to working together and ensuring a seamless guest experience.

Best regards,

Ex Stay Team
